items.sentence: I play guitar with a band every Saturday night.
Tom checked the TV schedule to see what was on.
Tom closed his briefcase and handed it to Mary.
I hope Tom didn\'t do what you asked him to do.
I want to know if Tom can come tomorrow or not.
The doctor couldn\'t figure out what was wrong.
I don\'t believe that Santa Claus is imaginary.
Tom promised me that he wouldn\'t tell anybody.
Tom put a hot water bottle on Mary\'s forehead.
Tom and Mary don\'t talk to each other anymore.
